text:
I played both F-Zero and Wipeout to death. Neither series really took off in terms of popularity, possibly because of their extreme difficultly. I astounded myself at how great my reflexes became from playing these games. I hope that soon, games like this will be online and very popular.

Also, here's to the development of high temperature superconductors so such craft can actually exist in the future.
